items.question: Is my data secure?
items.answer: Yes. We use enterprise-grade encryption, regular audits, and are GDPR compliant.

items.question: Can I integrate with my payroll/accounting software?
items.answer: Yes. We offer integrations with major payroll, accounting, and ERP systems.

items.question: How long does onboarding take?
items.answer: Most customers are up and running in under a week with our guided onboarding.

items.question: Is there a free trial?
items.answer: Yes, you can start with a 14-day free trial. No credit card required.

items.question: Do you offer multi-language support?
items.answer: Yes, our platform supports English, Arabic, and French.
